resources.string: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products
LinkedIn is an American business and employment-oriented service that operates via websites and mobile apps. Founded on December 28, 2002
Coursera is a relatively young company. It was founded only in 2012. This emerging company loves to hire graduates from Santa Clara University,
Mozilla is a free software community founded in 1998 by members of Netscape
The park of my youth. From coming here to play as a child, sneaking away from a football game at St Francis
This is a nice neighborhood park with a lot of grass and shade. I love the tennis courts here.
Sylvan Ave & DeVoto St Mountain View
I love how beautiful the scenery is at this park. It is completely hidden from the street, so you actually can\'t see it
It\'s a specious park with lots of facilities for all ages. There\'s two playgrounds and some swings.

Loved the ambiance, food and excellent service. My boyfriend surprised me with this lovely place. They had music that night, which we enjoyed! The food was delicious, desert was awesome! A dress-up kind of place which is rare. Loved it!.

Went there on a business trip. Three different dips/salsa with nachos as a free intro snack, each of the dips having their own character and tasting great. Had the guacamole, was very fresh and tasted great. Had the chicken in a sauce with cocoa beans.
2020 W El Camino Real, Mountain View, CA 94040–2104
You can\'t beat the food at this location. The service is good.. good place for take out as well. Parking can be a pain sometimes if you are looking something closer to this restaurant.
I love going to xanhs for their happy hour. The selection of food is great and I usually want to try one of everything in their menu. My fav is the garlic noodles, spring rolls, and kobi beef dish..
Computer History Museum is a public benefit organization that preserves artefacts from computing history.
Shoreline Amphitheatre is an outdoor amphitheater.The venue has a capacity of 22,500, with 6,500 reserved seats and 16,000 general admission on the lawn.
NASA Gift Shop in Silicon Valley is a visitor center at the entrance of NASA\'s Ames Research Center in Moffett Field, California.
Palo Alto Junior Museum and Zoo
Palo Alto Junior Museum and Zoo is located in Palo Alto, California and part of the City of Palo Alto\'s Community Services Department. It was founded in 1934.
